education_text.0: In 1971, Perlis moved to      Yale University Yale University to take the chair of computer science and hold the Eugene Higgins chairIn 1982, he wrote an article,       Epigrams on Programming Epigrams on Programming , for the      Association for Computing Machinery Association for Computing Machinery's (ACM)      SIGPLAN journal, describing in sentence distillations many of the things he had learned about programming over his career
